data.body:
prompt_initial | Orchestration prompt sent
scope | knots-ac27
scope_unresolved | dependency-aware, sub-tasks
objective | Break bead knots-ac27 ("Workflow designs / configurations") down into hierarchical tasks, 
making autonomous decisions about execution order, parallel execution, 
and vague requirements. 
 
Focus on this single bead and its potential sub-tasks. 
Organize them into dependency-aware scenes that can be executed in waves.**Planning parallel command execution**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno show knots-ac27'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno show knots-ac27 --help'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno --help'
**Planning CLI inspection approach**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls --help'
**Inspecting edge command usage**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno edge --help'
**Requesting knot edge list**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno edge list knots-ac27'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno show knots-ac27 -j'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -a -j'
**Checking for missing scoped items**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -j -q "sub-tasks"'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -j --state work_item'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -j -q "dependency-aware"'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -j --state blocked'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -j --state in_progress'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -j --state open'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -j --state in_progress'
**Planning parallel repo searches**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'rg -n "implementing|reviewing|approved|workflow" .'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'rg -n "state transition|transition|workflow definition|hardcoded" .'
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'rg --files .'
**Planning hierarchical waves and beads**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc "sed -n '1,260p' src/domain/state.rs"
**Planning CLI state inspection**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc "sed -n '1,320p' src/cli.rs"
**Inspecting UI layout color ordering**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc "sed -n '320,460p' src/list_layout.rs"
[executing] /bin/zsh -lc "sed -n '1,260p' src/ui.rs"
**Investigating state parsing and filtering**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc "sed -n '1,380p' src/listing.rs"
**Reviewing state management usage**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc "sed -n '280,520p' src/app.rs"
**Reviewing workflow state references**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc "sed -n '1,220p' README.md"
**Planning skill file access**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc "sed -n '1,260p' /Users/cartine/.codex/skills/orientation/SKILL.md"
**Inspecting child task aliases**[executing] /bin/zsh -lc 'kno ls -a -j -q "knots-ac27"'
